Business Checking

Business Checking

From basic checking to Account Analysis for businesses with a variety of cash management needs, we offer a wide range of checking products and services for every customer. 

related resources

  • Order Checks
  • Overdraft Services

Select Checking

  • Simplified checking for Sole Proprietors with low activity and limited check writing needs.
  • No monthly service charge.1
  • A minimum of five (5) Business Debit Card or ATM card transactions per statement cycle required.
  • StarConnect Plus online banking included.
  • No monthly fee for POS purchases.
  • Unlimited check writing, telephone transfers and automated payments.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Business Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Regular Checking

  • For any business type with simple account needs.
  • No service charge when balance requirements are met.1
  • StarConnect Plus online banking included. 
  • Unlimited check writing, telephone transfers and automated payments.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Business Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Interest Checking

  • For sole proprietors and nonprofit organizations.
  • Simplified checking with interest.
  • No service charge when balance requirements are met.1
  • StarConnect Plus online banking included. 
  • Unlimited check writing, telephone transfers and automated payments.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Business Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Account Analysis

  • For businesses with multiple cash management needs.
  • Checking with detailed cash management and financial tracking features.
  • Earnings allowance on positive collected balance may offset or eliminate fees.
  • StarConnect Plus online banking included. 
  • Fees are based on account activity. 
  • Consolidate your multiple business checking account balances to offset charges. 
  • Analysis statement lists detailed activity for simplified account management.

Business Star

Link up to four checking and savings accounts to your primary checking account and earn credit toward monthly activity costs. Plus, you get StarConnect Plus online banking, an introductory Business Check Package, free personal size safe deposit box, discounted fees on cashier’s checks, and more.

  • Packaged account with checking, savings, and valuable business savings.
  • No service charge when balance requirements are met.1
  • StarConnect Plus™ online banking included.
  • Combine up to five checking or saving accounts and receive a consolidated statement. 
  • Activity charges may be offset by credits based on balances. 
  • Bonus package includes introductory credit toward your first order of checks, and up to three cashier’s checks per month at no charge. 
  • Personal size safe deposit box included at no charge (or discount on a larger box).

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Business Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.
